name: @junctionrelay/shader-ascii
description: ASCII terminal renderer — 8x8 character cells, brightness-mapped bitmap glyphs, phosphor green CRT

junctionrelay.description: Converts the scene into an 8x8 pixel character grid. Eight density glyphs (space through @) selected by cell brightness, rendered as actual bitmap pixels. Phosphor green foreground on near-black, with scanline darkening, CRT flicker, phosphor glow bleed into dark neighbouring cells, and vignette. Fully self-contained.
